clearcontrol.microscope.timelapse.timer

Class TimelapseTimerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.microscope.timelapse.timer.TimelapseTimerBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaitingInterface, TimelapseTimerInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdaptiveAcquisitionTimer, FixedIntervalTimelapseTimer

    public class TimelapseTimerBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimelapseTimerInterface, WaitingInterface
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all timelapse timer implementations
    Author:
    royer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimelapseTimerBase(long pAcquisitionInterval, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
      Instanciates a timelapse timer for a given acquisition interval and time unit

        public void notifyAcquisition()
